job description:
Data Analyst - SQL Chicago, Illinois, United States

Data Analyst - SQL 392642

Location: Chicago, Illinois

Pay Rate: $40.00

Contract: 12 Months +

PLEASE Contact : Jenesis Omaga at (see application details) or (see application details)

Overall Responsibilities:

Provide superior technical support for internal workflow applications and sales tools.

Build successful relationships with both Sales Operations and Sales.

Troubleshoot, escalate and respond to support requests.

Communicate effectively with engineering and other technical groups to enhance tools and support sales.

Ensure prompt resolution of technical challenges.

Top 3 Daily Responsibilities - Sales ticket request support -Customer data analysis -System troubleshooting

Skill/Experience/Education
  • Mandatory Requirement: - Bachelor\'s Degree in any field (Business, Economics, Marketing and related field)
  • 1-3+ years professional experience
  • 1-2+ Years' experience with SQL
  • Strong Google Spreadsheets or MS Excel skills for quick reporting execution
  • Professional etiquette, organizational skills, and attention to detail
  • Interpersonal skills and ability to work with cross-functional teams
  • Ability to multi-task, set priorities, and work efficiently in a fast-paced environment
  • Experience in technical support .
  • Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Desired Nice to Have:
  • Master\'s degree in Business, Finance or equivalent related education and relevant experience
  • Aptitude to understand complex business processes
  • Strong written and oral communication skills
Type: Contract

Reference ID: 392642
